text: Veronica Lazăr (16 October 1938 - 8 June 2014) was a Romanian-Italian actress. She was known for her roles in Last Tango in Paris (1973), La Luna (1979), The Sheltering Sky (1990), and Besieged (1998). She married Italian actor Adolfo Celi in 1966. They had two children, director Leonardo Celi and actress Alessandra Celi. Her last role was in Me and You (2012). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Entertainers from Bucharest Category:Italian movie actors Category:Romanian movie actors
title: Veronica Lazăr
